questions.question: 1. How does a GNSS Rover receive real-time correction signals?

answers.b: Through the GNSS Base Station using RTK

questions.question: 2. Which of the following improves the accuracy of drone mapping?

answers.b: Flying the drone at a lower altitude

questions.question: 3. Why is it important to calibrate a drone before starting the survey?

answers.c: To ensure accurate data collection and flight stability

questions.question: 4. What does the hole in the tribrach help with during a GNSS Base setup?

answers.b: To center the instrument accurately over a survey point

questions.question: 5. What is the main benefit of using a GNSS-based land survey over traditional methods?

answers.a: Faster data collection and higher accuracy
